text: David Mozart or Motzhart or Motzhardt (1620 or 1621 or 1622 — January 28, 1685) was a German bricklayer and master builder of the Baroque period. He was the great-great-grandfather of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart. His sons are Franz Mozart (1649–1694) and Hans Georg Mozart (1647 – 1719), his grandsons are Johann Georg Mozart and Franz Mozart (sculptor). Category:1620s births Category:1685 deaths Category:German architects Category:People from Augsburg David
title: David Mozart
